messages.content:
📌 QUEST (Classes 8–12)
🗓️ Monday, 18th August 2025 | ⏰ 1:30 PM to 4:30 PM
🎯 Format: Interdisciplinary Quiz

ℹ️ A live multimedia quiz testing general awareness, logic, lateral thinking, and observation skills through written prelims and live finals.

📖 Sample Rules:
• Teams of 2 students; class-mix allowed.
• Written round determines 6 finalists.
• Quiz includes audio-visual and rapid fire rounds.
...

🏆 Awards: Top 3 Teams, Best Individual Quizzer...

🏆 Prizes for QUEST:
• Top 3 Teams
• Best Individual Quizzer
